title: Space Bermuda Triangle where satellites die in Earth's magnetic field weak spot
desc: The South Atlantic Anomaly was first identified in the late 19th century and continues causing satellite malfunctions, with the dangerous area expanding since 2014

title: Trump urges new nuclear treaty as Russia agreement ends
desc: US President Donald Trump has called for a brand new nuclear treaty after the last agreement with Russia expired prompting fears of a new global arms race.

title: Magnitude Earthquake Injures 15, Damages Buildings in Yogyakarta
desc: A 6.4-magnitude earthquake struck southern Java, injuring at least 15 people and damaging homes and public buildings in Yogyakarta.

title: Indonesia's government directs education funds to meals program as teachers struggle on low wages
desc: Temporary teachers in Indonesia paid low wages criticise a government decision to direct one third of yearly education funding to the president's flagship free meals program.
